Package com.paiondata.aristotle.service.impl

Class GraphServiceImpl

java.lang.Object
com.paiondata.aristotle.service.impl.GraphServiceImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
GraphService
@Service public class GraphServiceImpl extends Object implements GraphService
Service implementation for managing graphs. This class provides methods for CRUD operations on graphs and their relationships.

  • Method Details

    • getGraphVOByUuid

      public GraphVO getGraphVOByUuid(FilterQueryGraphDTO filterQueryGraphDTO)
      Retrieves a graph view object (VO) by its UUID.

      Retrieves the graph by its UUID using the GraphRepository.getGraphByUuid(String) method. Throws a NoSuchElementException if the graph is not found. Retrieves the nodes and relations of the graph using the
      NodeMapper.getRelationByGraphUuid(String, Map, Integer, Integer) method. Constructs and returns a GraphVO object with the graph's details and the retrieved nodes and relations.

      Specified by:
      getGraphVOByUuid in interface GraphService
      Parameters:
      filterQueryGraphDTO - The DTO containing the graph UUID and optional properties for filtering.
      It includes the graph UUID and an optional map of properties.
      Returns:
      A GraphVO object representing the graph and its nodes and relations.
      Throws:
      NoSuchElementException - If the graph with the specified UUID is not found.

    • deleteByUuids

      @Transactional public void deleteByUuids(GraphDeleteDTO graphDeleteDTO)
      Deletes graphs by their UUIDs.

      Checks if the provided graph UUIDs exist and belong to the specified user. For each UUID: - Retrieves the graph by its UUID using the CommonService.getGraphByUuid(String) method. - Throws a NoSuchElementException if the graph is not found. - Throws a IllegalStateException if the graph is bound to another user. Retrieves the UUIDs of related graph nodes using the getRelatedGraphNodeUuids(List) method. Deletes the related graph nodes using the NodeRepository.deleteByUuids(List) method. Deletes the graphs using the GraphRepository.deleteByUuids(List) method.

      Specified by:
      deleteByUuids in interface GraphService
      Parameters:
      graphDeleteDTO - The DTO containing the user identifier and the list of graph UUIDs to be deleted.
      It includes the user identifier (oidcid) and the list of graph UUIDs.
      Throws:
      NoSuchElementException - If any of the specified graphs are not found.
      IllegalStateException - If any of the specified graphs are bound to another user.

    • updateGraph

      public void updateGraph(GraphUpdateDTO graphUpdateDTO, org.neo4j.driver.Transaction tx)
      Updates an existing graph based on the provided DTO.

      Checks if the provided Neo4j transaction (tx) is null, a IllegalArgumentException is thrown. Retrieves the graph UUID from the graphUpdateDTO. Attempts to find the graph by its UUID using the CommonService.getGraphByUuid(String) method. Retrieves the current time. If the graph is found, updates the graph's title and description using the
      GraphMapper.updateGraphByUuid(String, String, String, String, Transaction) method.

      Specified by:
      updateGraph in interface GraphService
      Parameters:
      graphUpdateDTO - The DTO containing the updated information for the graph.
      It includes the graph UUID, title, and description.
      tx - The Neo4j transaction object used for the database operation.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - If the provided transaction is null.
      NoSuchElementException - If the graph with the specified UUID is not found.
